title: Verify: Implement CI/CD Pipeline with Coverage Reporting
description:
Run automated tests for task T-033.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Set up GitHub Actions for lint, type-check, test, build on PRs. Add coverage reporting and separate deploy pipelines for staging and production.
Criteria:

- Coverage reports uploaded
- Staging and production deploys separated
acceptance_criteria: CI runs lint, type-check, test, build on PRs
